LanguageData.SGM_PocketMapDisallowed: Pocket maps do not support stargate addresses.
LanguageData.SGM_GateDialFailed: Could not activate stargate: Receiving gate no longer exists or is currently in use.
LanguageData.SGM_CannotDialGateIsActive: Cannot dial: stargate is already active
LanguageData.SGM_RespawnGateString: Please respawn this gate (and its accompanying DHD) using devmode, as an update has broken it.
LanguageData.SGM_CannotWake: Cannot wake gate: Active gate already present.
LanguageData.SGM_GateHibernating: Address conflict: Gate in hibernation mode.
LanguageData.SGM_OpenCloseIrisDesc: Open or close this stargate's iris.
LanguageData.SGM_CreateSGSiteDesc: Create a new stargate site at this location.
LanguageData.SGM_RenameGateSiteDesc: Rename this stargate site to a more recognizable name.
LanguageData.SGM_CannotDecodeSGSymbols: Cannot decode: glyph deciphering not researched
